FieldSet.description: LAN: CMDB Class that is used to classify collections of configuration items (CIs) related to IP subnets in a local area network (LAN). The subnets are represented by instances of BMC_IPConnectivitySubnet. The instances are related by a BMC_IPSubnetsInCollection relationship. This class has no corresponding DMTF CIM class.
FieldSet.label: LAN
